description: Create, Delete or Modify NFS Client(s) for existing exports on Infinibox

no_root_squash.description: Don't squash root user to anonymous. Will be set to "no" on creation if not specified explicitly.

state.description: Creates/Modifies client when present and removes when absent.

client.description: Client IP or Range. Ranges can be defined as follows 192.168.0.1-192.168.0.254.

user.description: Infinibox User username with sufficient priveledges ( see notes ).

access_mode.description: Read Write or Read Only Access.
